product_name: SkirtSports Multi Sport Shorts - Women's - 8" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a lightweight chamois for the ride and quick-drying fabric for the swim, the women's 8 in. inseam SkirtSports Multi Sport Shorts are designed for performance during triathlon training or racing. UPF 30 fabric blend stretches with you, feels soft against your skin and efficiently wicks moisture to keep you cool. Women-specific chamois adds comfort to the ride with plush, seamless padding technology. Pockets on the thighs provide small storage for gels, snacks and your portable media player. Wide elastic in back waist ensures a comfortable, stable fit; elastic hems feature silicone grippers to keep shorts in place. The women's 8 in. inseam SkirtSports Multi Sport Shorts have reflective accents to help you stay visible in low light. Closeout.
short_description: With a lightweight chamois for the ride and quick-drying fabric for the swim, the women's 8 in. inseam SkirtSports Multi Sport Shorts are designed for performance during triathlon training or racing.
